channel.title: npj Quantum Materials
channel.description:
Open for Submissions

Publishing high-quality research on quantum materials and condensed matter.

npj Quantum Materials is a fully open-access journal that aims to publish work that significantly advances understanding of the fundamental properties, fabrication and applications of quantum materials.

npj Quantum Materials covers topics including, but not limited to, superconductivity and superconducting materials, correlated electronic physics and materials, topological quantum physics and materials, quantum phenomena in advanced energy materials, condensed matter, and the materials science of advanced quantum technologies.

In addition to original research, the journal welcomes critical Reviews, and thought-provoking Perspectives and Comment articles.
